statement: Find the derivative of $f(x) = 3x^4 - 5x^2 + 2$ at $x = 2$.
Evaluate the integral $\int_0^3 (2x + 1) dx$.
Calculate the determinant of the matrix $A = [[4, 1], [3, 2]]$.
Two forces, 30 N and 40 N, act perpendicularly to each other. Find the magnitude of the Resultant Force ($R$).
A 10 kg block sits on a horizontal surface with a static friction coefficient $\mu_s = 0.4$. Find the maximum Static Frictional Force ($F_s$) before the block moves. Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
A car starts from rest and accelerates at a constant $5 m/s^2$. Find its velocity ($v$) after 4 seconds.
A projectile is launched vertically with an initial velocity of $29.43 m/s$. Calculate the Time ($t$) it takes to reach maximum height. Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
Find the Kinetic Energy ($KE$) of a 2 kg object moving at $10 m/s$.
Find the specific weight ($\gamma$) of water if its density is $1000 kg/m^3$. Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
Calculate the Pressure ($P$) at a depth of 5 m in a tank of water ($\rho = 1000 kg/m^3$). Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$ and ignore atmospheric pressure.
A container holds 2 moles of an ideal gas at 300 K. If the volume is $0.05 m^3$, find the Pressure ($P$). Use $R = 8.314 J/(mol \cdot K)$.
Find the Future Value ($F$) of $1000 invested today at 5% annual interest after 3 years.
A circular rod with a diameter of 0.02 m is pulled with a force of 3141.59 N. Find the Axial Stress ($\sigma$).
A 200 N force is applied perpendicularly to a 0.5 m long wrench. Find the Moment ($M$) at the bolt.
If the probability of an event A is 0.3 and B is 0.4 (mutually exclusive), find $P(A \cup B)$.
A constant force of 50 N is applied to a 10 kg sled on a frictionless surface. Find the Acceleration ($a$).
Water flows through a 0.1 m diameter pipe at $2 m/s$. It then enters a pipe with a diameter of 0.05 m. Find the new Velocity ($v_2$).
How much Heat ($Q$) is required to raise 2 kg of water from 20°C to 25°C? ($c_p = 4.18 kJ/(kg \cdot K)$).
What is the equivalent Annual Cost ($A$) of a machine that costs $10,000 initially and lasts 10 years with 0% interest?
In a right triangle, the hypotenuse is 10 and one angle is 30 degrees. Find the length of the Opposite Side ($x$).
Calculate the Sample Standard Deviation ($s$) of the data set: [2, 4, 6, 8, 10].
A force vector is given by $\mathbf{F} = 3\mathbf{i} + 4\mathbf{j} + 12\mathbf{k}$ N. Calculate the magnitude of the force ($|F|$).
A 0.5 kg ball traveling at 20 m/s hits a wall and rebounds at 15 m/s in the opposite direction. Find the magnitude of the Impulse ($I$).
Water flows through a horizontal pipe. At point 1, the pressure is 150 kPa and velocity is 2 m/s. If the velocity at point 2 is 4 m/s, find the Pressure at point 2 ($P_2$). Use $\rho = 1000 kg/m^3$.
In a closed system, 500 J of heat is added while the system performs 200 J of work. Calculate the change in Internal Energy ($\Delta U$).
A bolt with a diameter of 10 mm is subject to a double shear force of 15 kN. Find the Average Shear Stress ($\tau$) in the bolt.
A project has an initial cost of $50,000 and provides a total present value benefit of $75,000. Calculate the Benefit-Cost Ratio ($B/C$).
A flywheel rotates at 1200 rpm. Find its Angular Velocity ($\omega$) in radians per second.
Find the Centroid ($x$) of a right triangle with base $b=3$ and height $h=6$, where the right angle is at the origin (0,0).
A steel rod ($E = 200 GPa$) is 2 m long. If it is subjected to an axial stress of 100 MPa, find the total Elongation ($\delta$).
A cube with 0.5 m sides is fully submerged in water. Find the Buoyant Force ($F_b$). Use $\rho = 1000 kg/m^3$ and $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
A Carnot engine operates between 600 K and 300 K. Calculate its maximum Thermal Efficiency ($\eta$).
Solve for $y(1)$ given $dy/dx = 2x$ and the initial condition $y(0) = 5$.
A cable supports a uniform load of 10 kN/m over a horizontal span of 20 m. Find the vertical reaction ($R_y$) at each support.
A solid shaft with a radius of 0.05 m is subjected to a torque of 500 Nm. Find the Maximum Shear Stress ($\tau_{max}$).
Find the Present Worth ($P$) of a $5,000 payment to be received in 5 years at an interest rate of 8% compounded annually.
A ball is thrown horizontally from a height of 20 m with an initial velocity of 10 m/s. Find the horizontal Distance ($d$) it travels before hitting the ground. Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
A Pitot tube in a water flow measures a stagnation pressure of 2000 Pa above static pressure. Find the Flow Velocity ($v$). Use $\rho = 1000 kg/m^3$.
Calculate the change in Entropy ($\Delta S$) when 1000 J of heat is transferred isothermally to a system at 500 K.
Find the dot product of vectors $\mathbf{A} = [2, -3, 1]$ and $\mathbf{B} = [4, 2, -5]$.
A crate is on a ramp. The angle of the ramp is increased until the crate begins to slide at 30 degrees. What is the coefficient of Static Friction ($\mu_s$)?
A beam has a rectangular cross-section ($b=0.1 m, h=0.2 m$). Calculate the Section Modulus ($S$) about the neutral axis.
A spring with $k = 500 N/m$ is compressed by 0.1 m. Find the Potential Energy ($U_s$) stored in the spring.
Using Straight-Line Depreciation, find the annual depreciation charge for an asset with an initial cost of $20,000, a salvage value of $2,000, and a life of 6 years.
A fluid has a dynamic viscosity of 0.001 Pa·s and a density of $800 kg/m^3$. Find the Kinematic Viscosity ($\nu$).
Find the Enthalpy ($h$) of a mixture with a quality $x=0.4$, saturated liquid enthalpy $h_f = 400 kJ/kg$, and saturated vapor enthalpy $h_g = 2600 kJ/kg$.
Find the magnitude (modulus) of the complex number $z = 5 + 12i$.
In a simple toggle clamp, a 100 N input force results in a 500 N clamping force. What is the Mechanical Advantage ($MA$)?
A rod is subjected to an axial load of 1000 N resulting in an elongation of 0.002 m. Find the Strain Energy ($U$).
A motor lifts a 100 kg mass at a constant speed of 2 m/s. Find the Power ($P$) required. Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
Find the slope of the curve $y = x^3 - 2x + 5$ at the point where $x = 1$.
Determine the magnitude of the resultant of two forces: $F_1 = 10$ N acting due East and $F_2 = 10$ N acting due North.
A car travels around a circular track with a radius of 100 m at a constant speed of 20 m/s. Calculate the centripetal acceleration ($a_c$).

A vertical rectangular gate (width = 2 m, height = 3 m) is submerged in water such that the top edge is at the surface. Find the total hydrostatic force ($F$) on one side. Use $\rho = 1000 kg/m^3$ and $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
Find the energy required to melt 5 kg of ice at 0°C. Latent heat of fusion $L_f = 334 kJ/kg$.
A steel bar ($\alpha = 12 \times 10^{-6} /°C, E = 200 GPa$) is fixed between two rigid walls. If the temperature increases by 50°C, find the magnitude of the induced thermal stress ($\sigma$).
Calculate the effective annual interest rate ($i_e$) if the nominal rate is 12% compounded monthly.
Evaluate the definite integral $\int_1^2 (3x^2) dx$.

The centroidal moment of inertia of a rectangle is $I_x = 100 m^4$. If the area is $20 m^2$, find the moment of inertia ($I_{x'}$) about an axis parallel to the centroidal axis at a distance $d = 3 m$.
A 1000 kg car moving at 10 m/s collides with and sticks to a stationary 2000 kg truck. Find the final velocity ($v_f$) of the wreckage.
A bag contains 5 red balls and 3 blue balls. If two balls are drawn at random without replacement, find the probability ($P$) that both are red.
Find the angle ($\theta$) in degrees that the force vector $\mathbf{F} = 4\mathbf{i} + 3\mathbf{j}$ makes with the positive x-axis.
A ball is kicked from the ground with an initial velocity of 20 m/s at an angle of 45 degrees. Calculate the maximum height ($H$) reached. Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
A Venturi meter with a discharge coefficient $C_d = 0.98$ calculates a theoretical flow rate of $0.1 m^3/s$. Find the actual flow rate ($Q_{act}$).
A gas at 2 atm and 300 K is compressed isothermally until its pressure is 4 atm. Find the final Volume ($V_2$) if the initial volume was $10 L$.
A 4 m simple beam has a concentrated load of 20 kN at its center. Find the maximum shear force ($V_{max}$) in the beam.
A company needs $50,000 in 10 years. If the interest rate is 6% compounded annually, what uniform end-of-year deposit ($A$) is required?
Find the sum ($S$) of the infinite geometric series: $10 + 5 + 2.5 + ...$
Calculate the Area Moment of Inertia ($I_x$) for a circle with a radius $r = 0.1 m$.
Two identical billiard balls collide. Ball A is moving at 5 m/s and Ball B is stationary. If the collision is perfectly elastic ($e=1$), find the velocity of Ball B ($v_{B2}$) after impact.
What is the absolute pressure ($P_{abs}$) at a location where the gauge pressure is 35 kPa and the atmospheric pressure is 101.3 kPa?
A heat engine receives 1000 kJ of heat and rejects 600 kJ. Calculate the Work output ($W$).
A 2 m long wire stretches 1 mm under a load. Find the engineering strain ($\epsilon$).
An investment of $12,000 saves $3,000 per year. What is the simple payback period ($n$) in years?
Find the x-coordinate of the centroid ($\bar{x}$) for a semi-circle of radius $r=4$ centered at the origin, located in the upper half-plane.
Force $A = 100 N$ at 0° and Force $B = 100 N$ at 180°. Find the magnitude of the Resultant Force ($R$).
A 5 kg block is lifted 10 m. Calculate the change in Gravitational Potential Energy ($\Delta PE$). Use $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
Find the capillary rise ($h$) of water in a tube with radius 0.001 m. Surface tension $\sigma = 0.0728 N/m$, $\theta = 0$, $\rho = 1000 kg/m^3$, $g = 9.81 m/s^2$.
For an ideal gas, if the temperature increases from 300 K to 350 K and $c_v = 0.718 kJ/kg \cdot K$, find the change in specific internal energy ($\Delta u$).

category: Mechanics of Materials: Factor of Safety
statement: If the yield strength of a material is 250 MPa and the allowable stress is 100 MPa, find the Factor of Safety ($FS$).
